text: Myötätuulirock 2011 Markus Eurén (born 19 April 1978) is a keyboard musician. He currently plays keyboard in the Finnish pagan metal band Moonsorrow. He is also in their grindcore side project called Lakupaavi. Markus uses a Korg Triton Extreme and N364 Keyboards. His idols are Matti Kärki, C.G.E. Mannerheim. His favorite bands and albums to listen to are Vreid - Kraft, Demoniac - The Fire and the Wind, Satyricon - The Shadowthrone, Dismember - Death Metal. ==References== Category:Heavy metal keyboardists Category:Finnish heavy metal keyboardists Category:Living people Category:1978 births
title: Markus Eurén
